dao.name: QRY_HOLIDAY_RF_COUNT
dao.statement: select COUNT(*) as dateCount from holiday_rf where athena_id = trim(:athena_id) and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and batch_dat BETWEEN TO_DATE(:begin_dat , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(:end_dat , 'YYYY/MM/DD')

dao.name: QRY_HOLIDAY_RF
dao.statement: select h.batch_dat,h.day_sta,k.color_num, k.hotel_cod from holiday_rf h left join holiday_kind_rf k on h.athena_id = k.athena_id and h.hotel_cod = k.hotel_cod and h.day_sta = k.day_sta where h.athena_id = :athena_id and trim(h.hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and h.batch_dat between TO_DATE(:begin_dat , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(:end_dat , 'YYYY/MM/DD')

dao.name: QRY_HOLIDAY_RF_NUM
dao.statement: select count(*) as count From holiday_rf where trim(athena_id) = trim(:athena_id) and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(day_sta) = trim(:day_sta) and rownum =1
